name: Blended Together
description:
Blended Together

Instructions: Collect the falling fruit according to the recipe on the top right. Collect a blender with your collected fruit. Become a delicious yogurt together.

Controls:     Moving Left: A           &         Moving Right: D 

Made by:  Tavera04 – Programmer,    LoriTom – Artist/ Programmer,    Casey - Music

Free Audio from ArrowheadProductions, JustInvoke, and AbdrTar
